column5: Hey guys/gals, I have a Garmin Oregon 200 and was wondering if the BlueChart Canada g2 chip is best for the unit. I can't get a straight answer from BPS or RadioWorld about this chip. Should I just buy the inland lakes and Great Lakes chips separately. I really need the inland lakes more than anything but could use the Great lakes chip as well. I heard that the BlueChart is mainly for the Great Lakes but am not sure. Does this make sense? Thanks for the help.
Can't help with the answer, but you are back to the top.
